title: FS - T-3 Larry Doyle - SGC-3 VG - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS - T-3 Larry Doyle - SGC-3 VG - SOLD
posts.post_content: Beautiful vivid color, my photos don't do it justice.  Asking $155, or $150 if paid by Paypal FF.  I'll cover shipping & insurance .  The SGC # is 1249572-069.  Thanks.
